title: Report of open-market sale
context: [ยง668A-12] Report of open-market sale. (a) Unless required to do so within a shorter time by chapter 668, a broker appointed under section 668A-11(b) to offer heirs property for open-market sale shall file a report not later than seven days after receiving an offer to purchase the property for at least the value determined under section 668A-7 or 668A-11. (b) The report required by subsection (a) shall contain the following information: (1) A description of the property to be sold to each buyer; (2) The name of each buyer; (3) The proposed purchase price; (4) The terms and conditions of the proposed sale, including, without limitation, the terms of any owner financing; (5) The amounts to be paid to lienholders; (6) A statement of contractual or other arrangements or conditions of the broker&rsquo;s commission; and (7) Other material facts relevant to the sale. [L 2016, c 260, pt of ยง1]
